title: Bengal coconut dal
description: I have done away with fresh coconut because dried is so much easier, but if you have the time, fresh coconut is tastier.
ingredients: 250g/9oz chana dhal (also called Bengal gram lentils), thoroughly cleaned
2 tbsp oil, unsalted butter or ghee
3 heaped tbsp flaked or desiccated coconut or ¼ small fresh coconut, flesh chopped into small cubes
